# ispconfig_web_database_user (Resource)

Manages a database user in ISP Config. Deprecated: use `ispconfig_mysql_database_user` or `ispconfig_pgsql_database_user` instead.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "ispconfig_web_database_user" "example" {
  database_user     = "app_user"
  database_password = var.database_password
}

variable "database_password" {
  type      = string
  sensitive = true
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `database_password` (String, Sensitive) The database password.
- `database_user` (String) The database username.

### Optional

- `client_id` (Number) The ISP Config client ID.
- `server_id` (Number) The server ID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) The ID of the database user.
